text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends YOU are trying to take my adult autistic sons only source of medical insurance away during covid19 while simultaneously during your Administration doing nothing to enhance laws and opportunities for adults with mental illnesses.  You are heartless and corrupt AF. You need to go.
